entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @tomphillipsin Trump started this massive plague of ignorance (the other pandemic) by instilling skepticism in true facts so his fictional version of reality can reign supreme. Now it’s normalized, no one trusts anything, now everyone is joining in this great con game of utter stupidity!!!
